title: e^x is Its Own Derivative
description: Interactive simulation demonstrating that the exponential function e^x is unique because its derivative equals the function itself. At every point on the curve, the slope of the tangent line equals the function value e^x.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Derivatives
Exponential Functions
Differential Calculus

controls.label: x-value
controls.description: Move the point along the x-axis to observe how y-value and slope change

controls.label: Show Tangent
controls.description: Toggle visibility of the tangent line at the current point

controls.label: Compare y and slope
controls.description: Highlights the equality between the function value and slope with a visual pulse effect
